prompt.text: You have been working alongside your counterpart for a few months now and he has now invited you for a meal at his home. During the meal, he serves you food from the communal plate with his hands. Which of the following is an appropriate response?

feedback.text: Actually, you should be gracious about the food offered to you since it is a sign of hospitality.

translation.text: Decline what your host has served you.

feedback.text: As a gesture of welcome, your hosts might serve you personally and they may do so using their hands. You can also serve your host food to return the gesture.

translation.text: Eat the food served to you.
